TopicTitle: Visual & Physical Bugs Fill The Lastest DRSS Episode: Most Kerbal Refueling Rocket & Unplanned Station Disassembly For Science(?)

Articles.Content:
Hey,
This time around I'm posting a pre-patch one video and lads was it tough!
Loooots of Bugs and Kraken attacks in this episode like Kerbin without atmosphere and water or the Exploding lander at undocking.

But even through all the struggles the DRSS keeps on expanding and luckily enough the 1st patch solved various of the problems.

Hopefully you may enjoy the video!
